name: user_upload
title: MRI Submission
subtitle: A place where you can submit a MRI file to process

metas.upload_limit_reached_label: Sorry, but you reach the limit of maximum upload per day, try tomorrow ...
metas.upload_select_label: 1 First, **select** from our tools one of the **automated pipelines** that suits you
metas.upload_custom_label: 2 Then **select a valid MRI image file**, and fill-up mandatory and optional fields. - You **must choose** an **anonymized** and **compressed** (zip, tgz, nii.gz (no tar)) file containing a **single T1w NIfTI file**.
metas.upload_uimode_label: - You can display automated pipelines as
